content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ home services. How can we assist you with your electrical needs today?
Hi, I think I need some electrical work done, but I'm not sure what exactly yet.
I can help with that! May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mary. Can you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Sure, I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thanks, Mary. Let me verify that your address is within our service area.
Great news! We do serve your area. When would be a convenient time for one of our electricians to visit you?
Actually, I’m moving soon so I don’t really want to invest in repairs right now. Maybe another time.
reason: Customer is moving and does not want to schedule repairs

content: I understand, Mary. If you ever need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day and good luck with your move!
reason: Customer is moving and declined appointment
